Html:
Hi, I'm a new WPF toolkit user. I'm using it mainly to implement charts in my WPF based application.

I need your help for the DataVisualization.Charting.ColumnSeries. It's not clear to me whether it is possible or not to disable animations in case of data update.

I need in fact to update an histrogram with a rate of few seconds so the animation effects are very annoying in this case.  

The enumeration AnimationSequence does not include a NoAnimation item.

Looking into the source code it seems like the animation is always active ( DataPointSeries class, StaggeredStateChange function ), so maybe I'm missing something.

 

Thanks in advance for your help.
